description: This is a JavaScript source file defining a LightningJS component called 'Home'. It imports external components and libraries, and specifies the component's structure, initial state, lifecycle hooks, and methods.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the home page with animated logo, loader, and button.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Animates the color of the loader component by cycling through a predefined colors array at a specified interval.
